text: When I notice spending habits forming, I recognize them and choose to control and think ahead instead.
During moments when spending feels automatic, I notice it and choose to pause and evaluate instead.
When I feel the pull to spend without thinking, I notice it and choose to pause and consider value instead.
I let not being able to control spending habits prevent me from making thoughtful and valuable purchases.
When I notice myself spending thoughtfully, I recognize it and choose to maintain those controlled patterns.
I see when spending needs evaluation, and I choose to pause and think about long-term value instead.
When I feel the urge to let habits control spending, I notice it and choose to pause and evaluate instead.
I let not identifying spending patterns prevent me from controlling habits and making thoughtful purchases effectively.
When I notice controlled spending working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those thoughtful patterns.
I recognize when spending becomes automatic, and I choose to pause and evaluate value instead.
When I feel the pull to spend without evaluating, I notice it and choose to pause and think ahead instead.
I let problems from not controlling habits prevent me from making thoughtful and valuable purchases.
When I notice thoughtful spending working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those controlled patterns.
I see when spending needs control, and I choose to pause and evaluate long-term value instead.
When I feel the urge to let automatic habits control spending, I notice it and choose to pause and think instead.
I let not being able to control spending habits prevent me from making thoughtful purchases effectively.
When I notice myself maintaining controlled spending, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those patterns.
I recognize when spending needs evaluation, and I choose to pause and consider long-term value instead.
When I feel the pull to spend without thinking ahead, I notice it and choose to pause and evaluate instead.
I let not identifying spending habit abilities prevent me from controlling patterns and making thoughtful purchases effectively.
